评论概述: Sleek, Stylish, and Superbly Comfortable – The Ultimate Workout Outfit
评论详情: Finding the perfect workout outfit can be a challenge, but this ensemble ticks all the boxes. The fit is impeccable, hugging the body in all the right places without restricting movement. It’s a rare find that’s true to size, making online shopping a breeze.  The color palette is another standout feature. Each hue is vibrant and energizing, perfectly capturing the essence of an active lifestyle. I was so enamored with the design that I couldn’t resist purchasing it in three different colors.  But what truly sets this outfit apart is the fabric. It’s soft to the touch, yet durable enough to withstand the rigors of intense workouts. It breathes well, keeping you cool and comfortable no matter how much you sweat.  In a market flooded with options, this workout outfit shines as a ‘got to have’ item. Whether you’re a fitness enthusiast or just looking for comfortable athleisure wear, this outfit won’t disappoint. It’s a testament to what workout apparel should be: functional, fashionable, and utterly flawless.

I’m 5’7” 108# so naturally I ordered the small originally (pink old). I’m usually a size 2 at finer stores and a 4-6 at Wally World. The leggings and shorts were too small. The old pink (pink color on shorts and leggings waistband) shorts were very short and the leggings had shorts attached which I didn’t like. Got the “M” set (pink new- solid black leggings and shorts + shorts are longer and no shorts attached to the leggings). Fit was perfect for all 5 pieces. Bra size for me is a 34B and I feel supported but not squished. Great deal. Order up

Fabric is super comfortable!  Love the pants and the jacket. The bra is kinda tight. I got a large. I do have larger upper body so that is only downside to grouping all together. The pants and shorts and all fit great and look great but sports bra too snug  Not enough elasticity.

The set is super cute, very comfy, love the color (light green), the fit is great. True to size. I'm 5'3, 120 lbs, the small fit me perfect. The thing is, the shorts on the outside of the pants and shorts?? It's strange so that's why I am returning. If it weren't for this. I would order another in a different color. Deal breaker.

评论概述: Fits perfect not sheer, great workout outfit! Will buy more!
评论详情: When I took it out of the package I was sure it would be too small but was delighted with the fit when I tried it on. I am 5'4" H and 155lbs weight and have a 44D bustline with 38" hips and a pretty round tummy. The fit was perfect and actually made me look thinner than I actually look. I did notice it came with shorts but the pants have shorts already built in which I did not notice in the pictures. The pants fit perfect but the extra pair of shorts were a bit tight in the waistline but I am going to the gym almost everyday so I expect to fit them as well. The top, shirt, and jacket fit excellent as well.

I recently purchased the 5 piece exercise yoga outfit set and I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase! The set includes a comfortable and stylish yoga top, sports bra, leggings, shorts, and jacket - all made with high-quality, breathable materials that feel great on my skin.  The yoga top is flowy and lightweight, making it perfect for a variety of workouts, and the sports bra provides the perfect amount of support. The leggings and shorts fit like a glove and stay in place during even the most intense workouts. I love the high-waisted design, which provides a flattering and secure fit.  The whole set is so comfortable and functional, and it's become my go-to for yoga, Pilates, and even running errands.  Not only is the quality of the set fantastic, but the price is unbeatable. I've seen similar sets for much more money, but this one is just as good, if not better. I would highly recommend this 5 piece exercise yoga outfit set to anyone looking for a comfortable, stylish, and affordable workout outfit.

评论概述: Great fit, good reliable workout set
评论详情: Great workout set. Definitely I prefer the version with the color strip around the waist and of the pant and shorts. Has a great look.  Super comfy, really holds me in in a professional athletic way. I like the grippiness of the fabric — it makes doing yoga, and things like arm balances or tree posture very good, because the fabric nicely holds stickiness in a way that promotes the posture. Many leggings are too slippery or pull when I’m tree post or they fall down etc. not these.  I am a professional yoga teacher and workout almost every day. I love wearing these sets for a comfortable and professional looking practice. Waistband stays high. Colors are good. Sports bra looks great and shorts are sexy while not overly revealing. I use them with a bohemian skirt coverup and seamlessly go from gym to classy coverup in moments. Jacket feels great and is lightweight.  Overall I’m very pleased. I have this set in multiple colors. Feels sturdy and adds to my confidence in the gym and studio. I’ve never once had to compromise with a wedgie nor any underwear or waist band showing. Shirt stays in place even in inversions. Looks good. Professional set: would buy again and in more colors. Wardrobe staple.

The fit is pretty spot on; the only complaint for me is the lower band on the bra is a bit too tight and feels very constricting when breathing. Material is soft and stretchy, color is true to pictures, and all pieces are NOT see through

评论概述: Item seems to be fine far now 😔 time will tell ...
评论详情: I like the item so far there is nothing not to like it's outfit far exercising I just walking around in ... Thanks 🙏👍...

评论概述: I would love it the design is not for me.
评论详情: It has shorts attached to the outside of the leggings don't like that feature I put them on the inside and it doesn't look as wonky. Love the top though. I'm just really picky with my clothes.
The wife loved it! Nice quality too!

Perfect for pot surgery physical therapy. I had shoulder surgery so it was perfect for showing scars without having to remove too many clothes. Definitely flattering! And the material is the perfect thickness for a workout and recovery.

评论概述: Tal como lo indican color perfecto
评论详情: Muy cómodo y tela suave

I usually don't do reviews, nor seem to have luck with clothes on Amazon. But I loved this purchase totally worth the prize, amazing material, amazing design. It has basketball shorts sewn into the leggings so there is no way your underwear can show through it! Super amazed! The only thing I will say is I got the largest size and it worked for me. I'm quite curvy and was nervous about it. I think it could be slightly improved by adding a different size element to the bra top. Any bigger than double d will be uncomfortable. But it's wonderful!

评论概述: All so cute and fit nicly
评论详情: For me all the item fit super accurately (medium) and looked very flattering on, nothing is overly baggy or revealing. The shorts have like an added barrier which I wasn't expecting but could come in handy if you exercise a lot (or could chaff, I don't do a lot of over exertion (bought more for lounging around my house/housework) so I'm not sure if they would chaff or not, just an assumption). The added shorts/cloth on the legging is surprisingly comfortable and you really don't notice the shorts immediately - so would be great if someone is a bit self-conscious on their front view in leggings. And the color is very beautiful. Material is thick so you can't see through it but feels thin enough to not cause horrible over heating. All in all very happy with this combo purchase. Great price for so many items you couldn't get them at the same price if you purchased separately. Appreciate the bundled items!

I am a pretty self conscious person so I don't even want to put up pictures of my struggle in this outfit; but let me tell YOU GUYS-  It is TIGHT. I am 5'8" 200lbs and I ordered the very biggest option they had.  I was so excited to receive the outfit that I pulled off the tags before trying them on. That was a mistake.  This outfit reminded me how fat I really am. I mean jesus do I have a LOT of work to do to try and fit properly in this.  If you have any belly and are ashamed of it; this isn't it...  I'm too embarassed to ask for my money back, and I'm kinda really upset about it.  But the silver lining is, I am now inspired to work out until I look good in it. Considering it's my only work out outfit this should make things interesting- at least.

I've got the tig ol biddies with a chubby belly and a lot of sports bras just don't give any real support or sit well. not only is this bra comfortable without me feeling suffocated and supported, but the material of all the clothes feel safe to wear out. I also love having different options for wearing out. I did severely chafe my thighs wearing the shorts on the treadmill but besides that very comfortable. the elastic also sits well without moving around.
Quick outfit to keep in the gym bag. It’s versatile, easy to wash, and dries quickly. The quality is low and I’m afraid the zipper will break so I don’t zip the jacket up, but it’s fine to work out.
Small up top but bottoms were good
Get a lot of pieces for your money. Do not like the leggings with the shorts attached. Material is good however I will stick with the set with just leggings
well made really atractive and comfortable...
Bought as a gift for my daughter. Highly recommend

评论概述: Liked but jacket was too small for me
评论详情: I thought is was great but the size XL jacket wasn’t big enough for me. Good purchase probably not a good fit for my upper body size.
Love the color and fabrics nice but it’s on the small size

This product runs small.  Not true to size the size xl seemed like an M/L and the M seemed super small ..  The fabric seems cheap and the shorts attached to the pants are weird.  The sleeves of the t shirt are not flattering and boxy. I'd give  this product a 2 for the versatility, but that's about it.
Nice outfit but the bra is too tight . Size up if you’re busty.

I am 5'2 and weight about 155 lbs. With a 36 C- 40 C cup boobs and a big booty. The only problem I have is that the bra size squishes my boobs a bit, but I wasn't too worried about it. Since I do at home workouts and all. As for washing, I would think that just putting it on a delicate cycle should work out just fine because of the material? Haven't tried doing that yet. Otherwise the fit is fine. Just the bra sizing is on the small side to me. So I just ordered a different bra size from some other seller. I'm satisfying the purchase. Was able to do all my stretches and workouts with no problem.

I really like how soft and light weight the material is. I ordered an XL. I'm 5'7" athletic 180. I should of ordered a large. The bottoms were a little loose on me. I love the shirt. The only downfall is having a large chest, so the shirt was really short on me. I know if I order the large, the shirt would be a crop top. I'd probably order the large just to see how it fits, but considering my size in certain areas. I'd probably still stick with the XL. I just the the shirt and jacket so much. I'd rather have those fit better than the bottoms. I love how reasonably this set is, and for the quality too. Highly recommend!

评论概述: Super Comfy! Not feeling crushed by meyworkout clothes
评论详情: I'm 5'3 around 126 lbs with a bit of a but and a little bit of belly going on - I read the reviews and got a medium (since I have a big butt I usually have to get mediums anyway) I was afraid the top would be too big but it still fit nicely and snug without squeezing me. I want to be comfy when i work out, not trying to find fake athletics wear that's really just shapewear.... The main reason I bought this is because other athletic wear I had was so tight I would get em.. camel toe while working out (the WORST) but this fits nicely and it isn't too loose or too tight! I was having shoulder pain from my last sports bra being a small and the bra in this set doesn't give me any issues at all, the padding is slightly thicker in the bar too which I personally like, and the fabric is nice enough to sleep in.
Love the color and the pieces only thing fabric is a little itchy but other than that, I’m happy with purchase ☺️
So comfortable and easy to mix and match. So far, it's laundered well also. Happy that I bought a couple sets.

Color is beautiful, fabric is nice and soft. Orderd and XL. For a woman who is not proportioned the same as a one size fits all, don’t buy the set. For me, the sports bra was to big & loose, the shirt was way to tight, the shorts fit just right. Did not realize the pants had shorts over them (I don’t prefer that style) ended up cutting those off for just leggings, but they fit just right however are long on me and I am 5’4”.
So comfortable,true to size and an overall great outfit for the price

For what is included in this set the value is great. I wore the jacket kayaking over a bathing suit and it was great. I changed into the shorts, sports bra and t-shirt for the trip home and the shorts were really short and wished there was a little more coverage for the sports bra out towards my armpits. The leggings fit well and I would wear those out. Overall, I love the color and value of this set. I may just wear the shorts at home to work out.

评论概述: Pieces vary on fit but material is comfortable.
评论详情: All pieces kind of vary on expectation. I ordered the pink set in large. The shirt is more of a medium, the bra and jacket match expectation of a large and the shorts and pants are tighter than expected for a large but still ok. Material is comfortable and colors are bright. If you can figure out what size to order or are ok with some items running small the price of the bundle for the number of items is great. I'd be interested if this seller does a similar bundle but where you can mix and match the sizes of each piece.
Like everything but the sports bra. The padding inside is not secured so have to constantly fight to get it in the correct spot and unfolded. Prefer not to wear

I didn't like how it fit. I'm wondering if I should have sized down. It was too fitted where it should be looser and too loose where it should be more fitted. I didn't know it had sewn on shorts over the leggings, I do not care for that at all. It is nice, comfortable fabric though.

I bought the large and it fits great besides the bra it's way to big but the rest fits perfect so was gonna try to shrink the bra or take it in otherwise it's great breathable light fabric the double pants and shorts is great but when it's 120 out it's something you don't want to really wear but I definitely will be wearing it in the house to work out will but more just wish you could choose the bra size so you can get what actualy fits

评论概述: Great material, most fit well. shirt was small compared to other pieces.

I bought these for my daughter to wear to the gym. She loved these pieces that interchange depending on the workout and weather. She loved the shorts and how they had attached boxer shorts to them which makes them more modest. She says with these, she doesn’t have to worry about them riding up. I ordered her a medium size. This set fits me perfectly! The bra is a little too small but I am very busty at the top, so you might want to wear another bra if you are heavy at the top. Other than that, this set is gorgeous! I’ve gotten so many compliments! I can’t wait to order more!

If you are large busted… better size up. Normally I can wear a medium or large. I decided to go with the large since I now mostly wear 8/10 or 10/12 tops and bottoms. The large top is VERY form fitting and the sport bra does not fit at all on the sides. My breasts are exposed on both sides where they should be concealed. Would be better if maybe the set was split up by tops and bottoms. Bottoms are fine. Jacket fits fine. Just the top and sport bra seem a size small, mainly the bra. If in doubt, size up and just have a bit looser bottoms.
The bra fits weird and I recommend you size up.

They don’t make anything larger than an XL I had to get that so mine is slightly tight but I feel it will loosen up more once I wear it more I don’t like how the pants looks as if it has shorts on them other than that best outfit I have bought because you get 5 pieces of outfit thank you Julie’s song and Amazon your amazing.

It's light and comfy and stretchy where it needs to be. Perfect workout clothes!!! Just letting you know that the bra may be a little short for women with large breasts.

For the most part the workout outfit is nice. Love the color only complaint is the sports bra isn't any coverage for a D cup. They should have the size choices separate.  I got xl.

I ordered a large. I am 5’6”, 155lbs. Everything fit great other than the sports bra top. It doesn’t cover everything it should and has an odd fit, so it doesn’t offer a lot of support. The other pieces fit perfectly and I’m overall happy with the quality.

It’s a great price for all you get. I personally love how it fits- the material is stretchy and fits well. I’m a curvy short girl with plenty of thigh, so admittedly I sometimes worry about how these things will fit. I ordered a medium set and even with my curves it all still fits beautifully. I plan to buy another set come the summer as I already wear these pretty regularly. They’re comfy, cute and I love how I feel in it.

This workout set is real cute! Decent quality wise. Is a little light weight, but good for warmer days if working out or walking outdoors. Super cute set! Fit is true to size. Arrived on time in good packaging. Great value so I bought another color!

I feel like this product ran small, I generally fit in large to xl but the xl was a little snug. The colors were great, very vibrant and the sports bra was relatively supportive. I would but it again and order a size up
I'm 5'2 and 130 pounds.  I ordered a medium and it runs small, especially the jog bra and the shirt.  Other than that, a good deal for the package.  I do like the light jacket.

Based on reviews I chose a Large..it was too big. I weigh between 167-170lbs and there was still loose material so I bought another one in medium. I have not received that one as yet.

评论概述: Nice product, but sizing is really off
评论详情: I bought this outfit in Large for my wife, and she is normally very comfortable in a USA large size (sometimes even medium). The jacket and sports bra were both on the small-end of large, but legitimately "large". But the shirt was on the small end of medium, and both the long pants and the shorts were not even medium--they would likely be classified as Small. It was very odd, as two of these items fit well, one was small, and two were VERY small. If they were consistent in their sizing, I would've bought XL sizes and accepted that these run small. But XL would've been too large for the two pieces, and still likely too small for two other pieces. So we simply returned and will look elsewhere.  It seems like a really nice product and looks really nice. For somebody with no waist and stick legs who likes REALLY short shorts, this would be a great outfit. I was disappointed that the fit was so odd.
The jacket, bra and shirt fit fine. The shorts and pants were a ok fit. My biggest concern was the material of the bottoms was thin. You can see through them. 😳

This is the perfect workout set. I'm 5'1, about 115 lbs and the small fits me perfectly. It definitely has some stretch to it and it's easy to move in. The pink color is beautiful. I must say best purchase ever. I run 3 times a week this has been my go to everything. Very soft flexible nice a comfortable

Was looking for an outfit I would be comfortable wearing in the gym. I am a little heavy set and this looks very flattering on me and it is very comfortable. Absolutely love it! Can’t wait to go to the gym tonight lol. I am 5’1 and weigh about 185 lbs and the XL fit me perfectly.
The bra is a little big, shirt is tight, shorts fit perfectly.  Haven't tried jacket or pants.
